info:
  title: IDN NIB Verification (Sync)
  description: Spec for verify_with_source_idn_nib API in sync mode
  version: 1.0.0
servers:
  - url: https://eve.idfystaging.com
  - url: https://api.idfystaging.com
paths:
  /v3/tasks/sync/verify_with_source/idn_nib:
   post:
      summary: IDN NIB Verification
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                task_id:
                  type: string
                  description: TaskID
                group_id:
                  type: string
                  description: GroupID
                data:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    id_number:
                      type: string
                      description: The NIB ID Number (required)
                  required:
                    - id_number
              required:
                - task_id
                - group_id
                - data
            example:
              task_id: 74f4c926-250c-43ca-9c53-453e87ceacd1
              group_id: 8e16424a-58fc-4ba4-ab20-5bc8e7c3c41e
              data:
                id_number: "0233010210646"
      responses:
        200:
          description: 'success'
          headers:
            Content-Type:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: application/json
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
              example:
                action: verify_with_source
                completed_at: '2021-08-05T18:37:49+05:30'
                created_at: '2021-08-05T18:37:44+05:30'
                group_id: 8e16424a-58fc-4ba4-ab20-5bc8e7c3c41e
                request_id: a28d2e71-3ad8-483e-afa7-331d555c8ea6
                result:
                  valid: true
                status: completed
                task_id: 74f4c926-250c-43ca-9c53-453e87ceacd1
                type: idn_nib
Specs(async):
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: IDN NIB Verification (Asnc)
  description: Spec for verify_with_source_idn_nib API in async mode
  version: 1.0.0
servers:
  - url: https://eve.idfystaging.com
  - url: https://api.idfystaging.com
paths:
  /v3/tasks/async/verify_with_source/idn_nib:
   post:
      summary: IDN NIB Verification
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                task_id:
                  type: string
                  description: TaskID
                group_id:
                  type: string
                  description: GroupID
                data:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    id_number:
                      type: string
                      description: The NIB ID Number (required)
                  required:
                    - id_number
              required:
                - task_id
                - group_id
                - data
            example:
              task_id: 74f4c926-250c-43ca-9c53-453e87ceacd1
              group_id: 8e16424a-58fc-4ba4-ab20-5bc8e7c3c41e
              data:
                id_number: "0233010210646"
      responses:
        200:
          description: 'success'
          headers:
            Content-Type:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: application/json
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
              example:
                action: verify_with_source
                completed_at: '2021-08-05T18:37:49+05:30'
                created_at: '2021-08-05T18:37:44+05:30'
                group_id: 8e16424a-58fc-4ba4-ab20-5bc8e7c3c41e
                request_id: a28d2e71-3ad8-483e-afa7-331d555c8ea6
                result:
                  valid: true
                status: completed
                task_id: 74f4c926-250c-43ca-9c53-453e87ceacd1
                type: idn_nib

openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Validate Shop Image (sync)
  description: Spec for SHIV API in sync mode
  version: 1.0.0
servers:
  - url: https://eve.idfystaging.com
  - url: https://api.idfystaging.com
paths:
  /v3/tasks/sync/validate/shop_image:
    post:
      summary: Async Validate Shop Image
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                task_id:
                  type: string
                  description: TaskID
                group_id:
                  type: string
                  description: GroupID
                data:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    document1:
                      type: string
                      description: Image Url (required)
                  required:
                    - document1
              required:
                - task_id
                - group_id
                - data
            example:
              task_id: 74f4c926-250c-43ca-9c53-453e87ceacd1
              group_id: 8e16424a-58fc-4ba4-ab20-5bc8e7c3c41e
              data:
                document1: https://c8.alamy.com/comp/H3D3H0/small-indian-shop-sells-merchandise-per-single-unit-H3D3H0.jpg
      responses:
        200:
          description: 'success'
          headers:
            Content-Type:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: application/json
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
              example:
                action: validate_shop_image
                completed_at: '2021-08-05T18:37:49+05:30'
                created_at: '2021-08-05T18:37:44+05:30'
                group_id: 8e16424a-58fc-4ba4-ab20-5bc8e7c3c41e
                request_id: a28d2e71-3ad8-483e-afa7-331d555c8ea6
                result:
                  is_shop: true
                  is_blur: true
                status: completed
                task_id: 74f4c926-250c-43ca-9c53-453e87ceacd1
                type: shop_image

Specs(sync):
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Document Image Validation API (Sync)
  description: This API is used to perform real-time validation checks on ID documents submitted by users.
  version: 1.0.0
servers:
  - url: https://eve.idfystaging.com
  - url: https://api.idfystaging.com
paths:
  /v3/tasks/sync/validate/document:
    post:
      summary: Document Image Validation Sync
      description: 
        This endpoint performs real-time validation checks on ID documents submitted by users. 
        It provides immediate feedback if an incorrect or unexpected document is submitted and identifies the type of an unknown OVD.
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              required:
                - task_id
                - group_id
                - data
              properties:
                task_id:
                  type: string
                  description: Unique identifier for the task
                  format: uuid
                group_id:
                  type: string
                  description: Identifier for the group
                  format: uuid
                data:
                  type: object
                  required:
                    - document1
                  properties:
                    document1:
                      type: string
                      description: Image in base64 format or URL of the document
                      format: document
                    doc_type:
                      type: string
                      description: Type of document for additional client-side validation
                    advanced_features:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        detect_doc_side:
                          type: boolean
                          description: Detect if the document uploaded is the front, back, or both sides
                          example: true
                        face_details:  
                          type: boolean
                          description: Check face details
                          example: true
                        check_scan:  
                          type: boolean
                          description: Check scan
                          example: true
                        readability:  
                          type: boolean
                          description: Check readability
                          example: true  
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful validation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  action:
                    type: string
                    description: Action taken for the request
                    example: validate
                  completed_at:
                    type: string
                    description: Timestamp when the action was completed
                    format: date-time
                    example: 2024-08-30T12:34:56Z
                  created_at:
                    type: string
                    description: Timestamp when the request was created
                    format: date-time
                    example: 2024-08-30T12:30:00Z
                  group_id:
                    type: string
                    description: Identifier for the group
                    format: uuid
                  request_id:
                    type: string
                    description: Identifier for the request
                    format: uuid
                  result:
                    type: object
                    description: Container for the result
                    properties:
                      detected_doc_side:
                        type: string
                        description: Detected side of the uploaded document
                        enum:
                          - front
                          - back
                          - both
                      detected_doc_type:
                        type: string
                        description: Type of document detected
                        enum:
                          - ind_pan
                          - ind_aadhaar
                          - ind_voter_id
                          - ind_driving_license
                          - ind_passport
                          - not_detected
                      is_readable:
                        type: boolean
                        description: Result of image readability
                      readability:
                        type: object
                        description: Container for readability score
                        properties:
                          confidence:
                            type: integer
                            description: Confidence score for image readability
                            minimum: 0
                            maximum: 100
                  status:
                    type: string
                    description: Status of the response
                    example: success
                  task_id:
                    type: string
                    description: The unique identifier of a requested task provided by you
                    format: uuid
                  type:
                    type: string
                    description: Type of request
                    example: document
        '400':
          description: Bad request due to invalid parameters
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  status:
                    type: string
                    description: Error status
                    example: error
                  message:
                    type: string
                    description: Error details
                    example: Invalid UUID format for task_id.
        '500':
          description: Internal server error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  status:
                    type: string
                    description: Error status
                    example: error
                  message:
                    type: string
                    description: Error message
                    example: An unexpected error occurred.

                    description: Timestamp when the request was created
                    format: date-time
                    example: 2024-08-30T12:30:00Z
                  group_id:
                    type: string
                    description: Identifier for the group
                    format: uuid
                  request_id:
                    type: string
                    description: Identifier for the request
                    format: uuid
                  result:
                    type: object
                    description: Container for the result
                    properties:
                      detected_doc_side:
                        type: string
                        description: Detected side of the uploaded document
                        enum:
                          - front
                          - back
                          - both
                      detected_doc_type:
                        type: string
                        description: Type of document detected
                        enum:
                          - ind_pan
                          - ind_aadhaar
                          - ind_voter_id
                          - ind_driving_license
                          - ind_passport
                          - not_detected
                      is_readable:
                        type: boolean
                        description: Result of image readability
                      readability:
                        type: object
                        description: Container for readability score
                        properties:
                          confidence:
                            type: integer
                            description: Confidence score for image readability
                            minimum: 0
                            maximum: 100
                  status:
                    type: string
                    description: Status of the response
                    example: success
                  task_id:
                    type: string
                    description: The unique identifier of a requested task provided by you
                    format: uuid
                  type:
                    type: string
                    description: Type of request
                    example: document
        '400':
          description: Bad request due to invalid parameters
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  status:
                    type: string
                    description: Error status
                    example: error
                  message:
                    type: string
                    description: Error details
                    example: Invalid UUID format for task_id.
        '500':
          description: Internal server error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  status:
                    type: string
                    description: Error status
                    example: error
                  message:
                    type: string
                    description: Error message
                    example: An unexpected error occurred.

openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Aadhaar OCR (Sync)
  description: Spec for extract_ind_aadhaar API in sync mode
  version: 1.0.0
servers:
  - url: https://eve.idfystaging.com
  - url: https://api.idfystaging.com
paths:
  /v3/tasks/sync/extract/ind_aadhaar:
    post:
      summary: Aadhaar OCR
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                task_id:
                  type: string
                  description: TaskID
                group_id:
                  type: string
                  description: GroupID
                data:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    document1:
                      type: string
                      format: document
                      description: Document URL (required)
                      minLength: 1
                    document2:
                      type: string
                      format: document
                      description: Document URL
                      nullable: true
                    consent:
                      type: string
                      enum: ['yes', 'YES']
                      description: 'yes/no'
                    advanced_details:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        extract_last_4_digit:
                          type: boolean
                  required:
                    - document1
                    - consent
              required:
                - task_id
                - group_id
                - data
            example:
              task_id: 74f4c926-250c-43ca-9c53-453e87ceacd1
              group_id: 8e16424a-58fc-4ba4-ab20-5bc8e7c3c41e
              data:
                document1: "https://image.com"
                consent: "yes"
                advanced_details: 
                  extract_last_4_digit: true
      responses:
        200:
          description: 'success'
          headers:
            Content-Type:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: application/json
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
              example:
                action: extract
                completed_at: '2021-08-05T18:37:49+05:30'
                created_at: '2021-08-05T18:37:44+05:30'
                group_id: 8e16424a-58fc-4ba4-ab20-5bc8e7c3c41e
                request_id: a28d2e71-3ad8-483e-afa7-331d555c8ea6
                result:
                  valid: true
                status: completed
                task_id: 74f4c926-250c-43ca-9c53-453e87ceacd1
                type: ind_aadhaar
